definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail

sentences.english: Young Balinese girls compete during an international yoga festival in Denpasar.
sentences.chinese: 巴厘島的年輕女孩們正在登帕薩舉行國際瑜伽節比賽。

sentences.english: Ban Ki-moon speaks at the Bali climate change conference in 2007.
sentences.chinese: 潘基文在2007年的巴厘島氣候變化會議上發言。

sentences.english: Since the Bali 10,000 kinds of customs, scenery is lai.
sentences.chinese: 由於巴厘島萬種風情，景物甚爲綺麗。

sentences.english: The Bali Barat National Park covers nearly all the coral reef and coastal waters.
sentences.chinese: 巴厘島巴莎國家公園幾乎涵蓋了所有的珊瑚礁和海域。

sentences.english: I should watch you wearing bikini running at Bali beach.
sentences.chinese: 我應該看到你穿三點式泳裝在巴厘島上。

sentences.english: That produced the most dramatic clash in Bali.
sentences.chinese: 那導致了巴厘島上最劇烈的衝突。

sentences.english: I'm going to introduce is located in the Bali sea temple.
sentences.chinese: 我將要介紹的是位於巴厘島的海神廟。

sentences.english: This is my first trip to Bali and my chosen hotel is HRH .
sentences.chinese: 這時我第一次到巴厘島，我選擇了硬石酒店。

sentences.english: The more traditional Bali lies beyond Kuta.
sentences.chinese: 比較傳統的巴厘島存在着超過庫塔。

sentences.english: As the Bali million species and customs scenery very lai.
sentences.chinese: 由於巴厘島萬種風情，景物甚爲綺麗。

sentences.english: Coincidentally, the most of Hindu population in Indonesia are located in Bali.
sentences.chinese: 無獨有偶，印尼的大部分印度教信徒都生活在巴厘島。

sentences.english: Conservationists claim that businessmen then flocked to the island and began rampantly abusing this quota.
sentences.chinese: 環保主義者說，商人云集巴厘島，開始濫用此項配額。

sentences.english: While on honeymoon in Bali, she learned to scuba dive.
sentences.chinese: 巴厘島度蜜月時學會了帶水肺潛水。

sentences.english: The gold bricks he stole from us had a Balinese dancer stamped on them.
sentences.chinese: 他從我們這偷走的金磚上刻着巴厘島舞娘。

sentences.english: Bali may be beautiful but this time round it is not for me.
sentences.chinese: 巴厘島固然美麗，但是現時的氛圍不適合我。

definition: Sabah, state of Malaysia in north Borneo 婆羅洲|婆罗洲
Fiji, country in the southwest Pacific Ocean
Chiang Mai, second city of Thailand
Kota Kinabalu (capital of Sabah state, Malaysia)
